transactioncolumncustomfield.description: Created 11/2022 by MDIMKOV This field on return authorization line is used by the support staff to select an item only among a specific subset of items then, the [akt_set_item_cs.js] client script fires on fieldChanged to set the right item; the idea is to shorten the list of available items for support staff for more information please contact mdimkov@travizer.com
transactioncolumncustomfield.help: Created 11/2022 by MDIMKOV This field on return authorization line is used by the support staff to select an item only among a specific subset of items then, the [akt_set_item_cs.js] client script fires on fieldChanged to set the right item; the idea is to shorten the list of available items for support staff for more information please contact mdimkov@travizer.com
transactioncolumncustomfield.label: Item (Support)
